verses.verse: And<WG2532> he began<WG756> to speak<WG3004> unto them<WG846> by<WG1722> parables<WG3850>. A certain man<WG444> planted<WG5452> a vineyard<WG290>, and<WG2532> set<WG4060> an hedge about<WG5418> it, and<WG2532> digged<WG3736> a place for the winefat<WG5276>, and<WG2532> built<WG3618> a tower<WG4444>, and<WG2532> let<WG1554> it<WG846> out<WG1554> to husbandmen<WG1092>, and<WG2532> went into a far country<WG589>.

And<WG2532> at the season<WG2540> he sent<WG649> to<WG4314> the husbandmen<WG1092> a servant<WG1401>, that<WG2443> he might receive<WG2983> from<WG3844> the husbandmen<WG1092> of<WG575> the fruit<WG2590> of the vineyard<WG290>.
And<WG1161> they caught<WG2983> him, and beat<WG1194> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> sent him away<WG649> empty<WG2756>.

And<WG2532> again<WG3825> he sent<WG649> unto<WG4314> them<WG846> another<WG243> servant<WG1401>; and at him<WG2548> they cast stones<WG3036>, and wounded him in the head<WG2775>, and<WG2532> sent him away<WG649> shamefully handled<WG821>.
And<WG2532> again<WG3825> he sent<WG649> another<WG243>; and him<WG2548> they killed<WG615>, and<WG2532> many<WG4183> others<WG243>;<WG3303> beating some<WG1194>, and<WG1161> killing some<WG615>.

Having<WG2192> yet<WG2089> therefore<WG3767> one<WG1520> son<WG5207>, his<WG846> wellbeloved<WG27>, he sent<WG649> him<WG846> also<WG2532> last<WG2078> unto<WG4314> them<WG846>, saying<WG3004>,<WG3754> They will reverence<WG1788> my<WG3450> son<WG5207>.

But<WG1161> those<WG1565> husbandmen<WG1092> said<WG2036> among<WG4314> themselves<WG1438>, This<WG3754> <WG3778> is<WG2076> the heir<WG2818>; come<WG1205>, let us kill<WG615> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> the inheritance<WG2817> shall be<WG2071> ours<WG2257>.
And<WG2532> they took<WG2983> him<WG846>, and killed<WG615> him, and<WG2532> cast<WG1544> him out of<WG1854> the vineyard<WG290>.

What<WG5101> shall<WG4160> therefore<WG3767> the lord<WG2962> of the vineyard<WG290> do<WG4160>? he will come<WG2064> and<WG2532> destroy<WG622> the husbandmen<WG1092>, and<WG2532> will give<WG1325> the vineyard<WG290> unto others<WG243>.

And have ye<WG314> not<WG3761> read<WG314> this<WG5026> scripture<WG1124>; The stone<WG3037> which<WG3739> the builders<WG3618> rejected<WG593> is<WG3778> <WG1096> become<WG1519> the head<WG2776> of the corner<WG1137>:
This<WG3778> was<WG1096> the Lord's<WG2962> doing<WG1096> <WG3844>, and<WG2532> it is<WG2076> marvellous<WG2298> in<WG1722> our<WG2257> eyes<WG3788>?

And<WG2532> they sought<WG2212> to lay hold<WG2902> on him<WG846>, but<WG2532> feared<WG5399> the people<WG3793>: for<WG1063> they knew<WG1097> that<WG3754> he had spoken<WG2036> the parable<WG3850> against<WG4314> them<WG846>: and<WG2532> they left<WG863> him<WG846>, and went their way<WG565>.
And<WG2532> they send<WG649> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> certain<WG5100> of the Pharisees<WG5330> and<WG2532> of the Herodians<WG2265>, to<WG2443> catch<WG64> him<WG846> in his words<WG3056>.

And<WG1161> when they were come<WG2064>, they say<WG3004> unto him<WG846>, Master<WG1320>, we know<WG1492> that<WG3754> thou art<WG1488> true<WG227>, and<WG2532> <WG4671> carest<WG3756> <WG3199> for<WG4012> no man<WG3762>: for<WG1063> thou regardest<WG991> not<WG3756> the person<WG1519> <WG4383> of men<WG444>, but<WG235> teachest<WG1321> the way<WG3598> of God<WG2316> in<WG1909> truth<WG225>: Is it lawful<WG1832> to give<WG1325> tribute<WG2778> to Caesar<WG2541>, or<WG2228> not<WG3756>?

Shall we give<WG1325>, or<WG2228> shall we not<WG3361> give<WG1325>? But<WG1161> he, knowing<WG1492> their<WG846> hypocrisy<WG5272>, said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Why<WG5101> tempt ye<WG3985> me<WG3165>? bring<WG5342> me<WG3427> a penny<WG1220>, that<WG2443> I may see<WG1492> it. penny: valuing of our money seven pence halfpenny

And<WG1161> they brought<WG5342> it. And<WG2532> he saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Whose<WG5101> is this<WG3778> image<WG1504> and<WG2532> superscription<WG1923>? And<WG1161> they said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Caesar's<WG2541>.

And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Render<WG591> to Caesar<WG2541> the things that are<WG3588> Caesar's<WG2541>, and<WG2532> to God<WG2316> the things that are<WG3588> God's<WG2316>. And<WG2532> they marvelled<WG2296> at<WG1909> him<WG846>.

Then<WG2532> come<WG2064> unto<WG4314> him<WG846> the Sadducees<WG4523>, which<WG3748> say<WG3004> there is<WG1511> no<WG3361> resurrection<WG386>; and<WG2532> they asked<WG1905> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>,

Master<WG1320>, Moses<WG3475> wrote<WG1125> unto us<WG2254>, If<WG3754> <WG1437> a man's<WG5100> brother<WG80> die<WG599>, and<WG2532> leave<WG2641> his wife<WG1135> behind him, and<WG2532> leave<WG863> no<WG3361> children<WG5043>, that<WG2443> his<WG846> brother<WG80> should take<WG2983> his<WG846> wife<WG1135>, and<WG2532> raise up<WG1817> seed<WG4690> unto his<WG846> brother<WG80>.
Now there were<WG2258> seven<WG2033> brethren<WG80>: and<WG2532> the first<WG4413> took<WG2983> a wife<WG1135>, and<WG2532> dying<WG599> left<WG863> no<WG3756> seed<WG4690>.
And<WG2532> the second<WG1208> took<WG2983> her<WG846>, and<WG2532> died<WG599>,<WG2532> neither<WG3761> left<WG863> he<WG846> any seed<WG4690>: and<WG2532> the third<WG5154> likewise<WG5615>.
And<WG2532> the seven<WG2033> had<WG2983> her<WG846>, and<WG2532> left<WG863> no<WG3756> seed<WG4690>: last<WG2078> of all<WG3956> the woman<WG1135> died<WG599> also<WG2532>.

In<WG1722> the resurrection<WG386> therefore<WG3767>, when<WG3752> they shall rise<WG450>, whose<WG5101> wife<WG1135> shall she be<WG2071> of them<WG846>? for<WG1063> the seven<WG2033> had<WG2192> her<WG846> to wife<WG1135>.

And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> said<WG2036> unto them<WG846>, Do ye<WG4105> not<WG3756> therefore<WG1223> <WG5124> err<WG4105>, because ye know<WG1492> not<WG3361> the scriptures<WG1124>, neither<WG3366> the power<WG1411> of God<WG2316>?

For<WG1063> when<WG3752> they shall rise<WG450> from<WG1537> the dead<WG3498>, they neither<WG3777> marry<WG1060>, nor<WG3777> are given in marriage<WG1061>; but<WG235> are<WG1526> as<WG5613> the angels<WG32> which<WG3588> are in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772>.

And<WG1161> as touching<WG4012> the dead<WG3498>, that<WG3754> they rise<WG1453>: have ye<WG314> not<WG3756> read<WG314> in<WG1722> the book<WG976> of Moses<WG3475>, how<WG5613> in<WG1909> the bush<WG942> God<WG2316> spake<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, I<WG1473> am the God<WG2316> of Abraham<WG11>, and<WG2532> the God<WG2316> of Isaac<WG2464>, and<WG2532> the God<WG2316> of Jacob<WG2384>?
He is<WG2076> not<WG3756> the God<WG2316> of the dead<WG3498>, but<WG235> the God<WG2316> of the living<WG2198>: ye<WG5210> therefore<WG3767> do<WG4105> greatly<WG4183> err<WG4105>.

And<WG2532> one<WG1520> of the scribes<WG1122> came<WG4334>, and having heard<WG191> them<WG846> reasoning together<WG4802>, and perceiving<WG1492> that<WG3754> he had answered<WG611> them<WG846> well<WG2573>, asked<WG1905> him<WG846>, Which<WG4169> is<WG2076> the first<WG4413> commandment<WG1785> of all<WG3956>?

And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> him<WG846>, The<WG3754> first<WG4413> of all<WG3956> the commandments<WG1785> is, Hear<WG191>, O Israel<WG2474>; The Lord<WG2962> our<WG2257> God<WG2316> is<WG2076> one<WG1520> Lord<WG2962>:

And<WG2532> thou shalt love<WG25> the Lord<WG2962> thy<WG4675> God<WG2316> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> heart<WG2588>, and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> soul<WG5590>, and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> mind<WG1271>, and<WG2532> with<WG1537> all<WG3650> thy<WG4675> strength<WG2479>: this<WG3778> is the first<WG4413> commandment<WG1785>.

And<WG2532> the second<WG1208> is like<WG3664>, namely this<WG3778> <WG846>, Thou shalt love<WG25> thy<WG4675> neighbour<WG4139> as<WG5613> thyself<WG4572>. There is<WG2076> none<WG3756> other<WG243> commandment<WG1785> greater<WG3187> than these<WG5130>.

And<WG2532> the scribe<WG1122> said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Well<WG2573>, Master<WG1320>, thou hast said<WG2036> the<WG1909> truth<WG225>: for<WG3754> there is<WG2076> one<WG1520> God<WG2316>; and<WG2532> there is<WG2076> none<WG3756> other<WG243> but<WG4133> he<WG846>:

And<WG2532> when Jesus<WG2424> saw<WG1492> that<WG3754> he<WG846> answered<WG611> discreetly<WG3562>, he said<WG2036> unto him<WG846>, Thou art<WG1488> not<WG3756> far<WG3112> from<WG575> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316>. And<WG2532> no man<WG3762> after that<WG3765> durst<WG5111> ask<WG1905> him<WG846> any question.

And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> answered<WG611> and said<WG3004>, while he taught<WG1321> in<WG1722> the temple<WG2411>, How<WG4459> say<WG3004> the scribes<WG1122> that<WG3754> Christ<WG5547> is<WG2076> the Son<WG5207> of David<WG1138>?

For<WG1063> David<WG1138> himself<WG846> said<WG2036> by<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151>, The LORD<WG2962> said<WG2036> to my<WG3450> Lord<WG2962>, Sit thou<WG2521> on<WG1537> my<WG3450> right hand<WG1188>, till<WG2193> <WG302> I make<WG5087> thine<WG4675> enemies<WG2190> thy<WG4675> footstool<WG5286> <WG4228>.

David<WG1138> therefore<WG3767> himself<WG846> calleth<WG3004> him<WG846> Lord<WG2962>; and<WG2532> whence<WG4159> is he<WG2076> then his<WG846> son<WG5207>? And<WG2532> the common<WG4183> people<WG3793> heard<WG191> him<WG846> gladly<WG2234>.

And<WG2532> he said<WG3004> unto them<WG846> in<WG1722> his<WG846> doctrine<WG1322>, Beware<WG991> of<WG575> the scribes<WG1122>, which<WG3588> love<WG2309> to go<WG4043> in<WG1722> long clothing<WG4749>, and<WG2532> love salutations<WG783> in<WG1722> the marketplaces<WG58>,
And<WG2532> the chief seats<WG4410> in<WG1722> the synagogues<WG4864>, and<WG2532> the uppermost rooms<WG4411> at<WG1722> feasts<WG1173>:

Which devour<WG2719> widows'<WG5503> houses<WG3614>, and<WG2532> for a pretence<WG4392> make<WG4336> long<WG3117> prayers<WG4336>: these<WG3778> shall receive<WG2983> greater<WG4055> damnation<WG2917>.

And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> sat<WG2523> over against<WG2713> the treasury<WG1049>, and beheld<WG2334> how<WG4459> the people<WG3793> cast<WG906> money<WG5475> into<WG1519> the treasury<WG1049>: and<WG2532> many<WG4183> that were rich<WG4145> cast in<WG906> much<WG4183>. money: a piece of brass money

And<WG2532> he called<WG4341> unto him his<WG846> disciples<WG3101>, and saith<WG3004> unto them<WG846>, Verily<WG281> I say<WG3004> unto you<WG5213>, That<WG3754> this<WG3778> poor<WG4434> widow<WG5503> hath cast<WG906> more<WG4119> in<WG906>, than all<WG3956> they which have cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the treasury<WG1049>:
